long_description: Featuring recycled materials, our quarter socks use CoolMax(R) EcoMade(TM) fabric, made from recycled plastic bottles, to deliver multisport performance. CoolMax EcoMade fabric offers the same moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance as regular CoolMax, yet is made of recycled PET. Nylon adds durability and spandex offers stretch and shape retention. Mesh-knit toe and instep panels promote airflow and move moisture away from feet, keeping them dry and blister free. Fully cushioned bottoms and heels add shock absorption and protection from wear. Lin Toe(R) ''no feel'' seams preclude irritation and chafing along toes. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Featuring recycled materials, our quarter socks use CoolMax(R) EcoMade(TM) fabric, made from recycled plastic bottles, to deliver multisport performance.
